import React, { useState, useEffect} from 'react' import BackTotop from './back_to_top' import Footer from './footer' import Navbar from './navbar' import SearchResult from './search_result' import TrendingCourses from './trending_courses' import { ReactSearchAutocomplete } from 'react-search-autocomplete' import axios from 'axios' import { Baseurl } from '../baseurl' import { items } from '../dashboard/suggestions' const AvailableCourses = () => { document.title = 'Fromhome | Available Courses' const [search, setSearch] = useState('') const [searchResult, setSearchResult] = useState([]) const [isSubmitting, setSubmitting] = useState(false) const handleOnSelect = (item) => { setSearch(item) } const formatResult = (item) => { return item; } const searchCourse = () => { if(search){ setSubmitting(true) axios.get(`${Baseurl}searchcourse`, { params: search }).then((res) => { setSubmitting(false) setSearchResult(res.data) }) } } return ( <>

Search for a course Search by categories: Software Software Software Software Software
) } export default AvailableCourses
